Text.val: 19.03.2014 SH SCR18787 Added discount calculation (update SFEX_CALCULATEDINTEREST and 4 other SFEX fields)

ExpSyntax.val: 'There exists no row in table SFBH'

Text.val: -- Set trigger (if no row is selected job turns to MSGW)
... calculate date to set SFEX_TRADINGTIMESTAMP is submodule
... finally submit BSF404 or BSF405, see Task suffix, after database updates
... check if invoice already exist via incremental files
... set to 0, to avoid double advances via incremental files
